q: our worst day in government,'' a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. The left-wing newspaper added that Andy Coulson 's departure leaves the prime minister with a crucial vacancy as the coalition government weathers dissent about cuts in public spending introduced to reduce a huge budget deficit. He explained on a forthcoming episode of ''Oprah Presents Master Class': I asked a very successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever.
